head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Police Seek Student's Attacker

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Police Seek Student's Attacker

body.head.byline: By THOMAS J. LUECK; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: New York City police continue search for man who beat and raped woman while holding her hostage for 17 hours; woman, student at Columbia Graduate School of Journalism, remains hospitalized (S)

block.p: Officers continued searching yesterday for the man who beat and raped a 23-year-old woman while holding her hostage for 17 hours, the police said. The woman, a student at Columbia's Graduate School of Journalism, remained hospitalized yesterday and has been joined by her family, according to a statement by Lee C. Bollinger, the university's president. The attack, in a building in Hamilton Heights, began at 11:30 p.m. Friday and ended on Saturday afternoon when the assailant set fire to a futon, and the woman fled.
